bot.findme: @{user} Hey!, you can find me on https://github.com/Bioblaze/TrovoBot
bot.questions: @{user} If you would like to meet me in person or have other questions, feel free to contact us at https://discord.gg/Kc7fyx2
bot.wiki: @{user} Read our commands Wiki for more information on what they do at https://github.com/Bioblaze/TrovoBot/wiki/Default-Commands
bot.consolecommand: This bot was created by Bioblaze Payne
bot.consolecommanddesc: Tells you information about the Bot itself.

shoutout.mentionuser: Check out {mention} at https://trovo.live/{user} - They are an awesome streamer and deserve some community love!
shoutout.mentionaccount: Check out {account} at https://trovo.live/{account} - They are an awesome streamer and deserve some community love!

say.nomessage: You have to put a message.

discordrpc.rpcerror:
Issue with Discord RPC, is Discord Connected?
Error: {error}
discordrpc.clearerr:
Issue Clearing the Activity for Discord RPC.
Error: {error}
discordrpc.streamstopped: Stream has stopped, Clearing the Discord RPC Activity.
discordrpc.seterr:
Issue setting the Activity in Discord RPC.
Error: {error}

obs.retry_attempt: Unable to connect to OBS. Attempting to reconnect: {count} of {max}

http.activated: HTTP Overlay Module Started on Port({settings.port})
http.failed_route:
[HTTP] ({route}) {pageID}.json is not found, does it exist at {location}?
Error: {error}

bot.cooldown: Hold-on for {timeLeft} more second(s) before reusing the `{name}` command.
bot.missing_permissions: You do not have permission to use this command. Sorry.
bot.contact_creator: There was a error with processing your Command. Please Contact Bioblaze Payne#6459 and let him know.
bot.lang_loaded:
Localization Files have been Loaded.....
Localization has been Set to: {lang}
bot.plugin_load_try_error:
Error Attempting to Load Plugin({name}) located at: {dir}
Error: {err}
bot.get_plugin_error: Invalid Plugin Requested. Check your spelling for Plugin: {plugin}
bot.get_processor_error: Invalid Processor Requested. Check your spelling for Processor: {processor}
bot.get_service_error: Invalid Service Requested. Check your spelling for Service: {service}
bot.get_chat_command_error: Invalid Command Requested. Check your spelling for the Chat Command: {command}
bot.processor_load_try_error:
Error Attempting to Load Processor({name}) located at: {dir}
Error: {err}
bot.service_load_try_error:
Error Attempting to Load Service({name}) located at: {dir}
Error: {err}
bot.plugin_info_desc: Gives you information on a Plugin within the System~
bot.plugins_desc: Displays a List of all Plugins within Trovobot, that are LOADED.
bot.ready: Bot loaded and ready to mod!
bot.plugin_name_invalid: No Plugin found by that name, please check your Spelling and try again.
bot.reloaded_plugin_added_chat: Loaded Reloaded Plugin into Chat Commands..
bot.no_plugins_loaded: No Plugins Loaded into the System.
bot.no_processors_loaded: No Processors Loaded into the System.
bot.no_services_loaded: No Services Loaded into the System.
bot.clear_console: Will clear all the Console leaving only the Commandline Prompt for Trovobot
bot.plugin_already_active: Plugin already Active, cannot active plugin.
bot.plugin_activated: Activated Plugin, and updated Settings file for the Plugin.
bot.plugin_activated_error:
Error while trying to Activate Plugin({name})
Error: {e}
bot.plugin_already_inactive: Plugin already Inactive, cannot deactivate plugin.
bot.plugin_deactivated: Deactivated Plugin, and updated Settings file for the Plugin.
bot.plugin_deactivated_error:
Error while trying to Deactivate Plugin({name})
Error: {e}
bot.plugins_deactivated: All Plugins Deactivated, and updated the Settings file for each Plugin.
bot.plugins_activated: All Plugins Activated, and updated the Settings file for each Plugin.
bot.processor_info_desc: Gives you information on a Processor within the System~
bot.processors_desc: Displays a List of all Processors within Trovobot, that are LOADED.
bot.processor_already_active: Processor already Active, cannot active processor.
bot.processor_activated: Activated Processor, and updated Settings file for the Processor.
bot.processor_activated_error:
Error while trying to Activate Processor({name})

bot.processor_already_inactive: Processor already Inactive, cannot deactivate processor.
bot.processor_deactivated: Deactivated Processor, and updated Settings file for the Processor.

Error while trying to Deactivate Processor({name})
Error: {e}
bot.processors_deactivated: All Processors Deactivated, and updated the Settings file for each Processor.
bot.processors_activated: All Processors Activated, and updated the Settings file for each Processor.
bot.processor_name_invalid: No Processor found by that name, please check your Spelling and try again.
bot.service_info_desc: Gives you information on a Service within the System~
bot.services_desc: Displays a List of all Services within Trovobot, that are LOADED.
bot.service_already_active: Service already Active, cannot active service.
bot.service_activated: Activated Service, and updated Settings file for the Service.

bot.service_already_inactive: Service already Inactive, cannot deactivate service.

bot.services_activated: All Services Activated, and updated the Settings file for each Service.
bot.service_name_invalid: No Service found by that name, please check your Spelling and try again.
bot.setlang_console: Sets the Language in the System
bot.setlang_invalid: That is a invalid Language Option please try one of these Options: {langs}
bot.getlang_console: Displays all Available Languages in the System
bot.setlang_save_error:
Attempting to Update Settings failed
Error: {e}

bot.what_password: What is the Password of the Bot Account?
bot.what_name: What is the Name of the Bot Account?
bot.what_page: What is the URL/PAGE for the Streamer the Bot is Monitoring?
bot.what_prefix: What is the Prefix of the Bot Account?
bot.what_lang: What is the Default Language of the Bot Account? Available Langs: {langs}

Failed to Setup and Save Settings
